Name: State Records New South Wales, Broken Hill Repository

About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Tues, Thurs, Fri 10am-1pm, 2-5pm, Wed and the 2nd, 3rd and 4th Sat of each month 10am-1pm.

About.Acquisition focus: This repository is the newest in the system. It holds a fascinating miscellaneous collection of Court records from Tibooburra dating from the 1880s.

About.Guides: Concise Guide to the State Archives, 2nd ed. (http://www.records.nsw.gov.au/cguide.htm)
